name: Project manager / Market Research Manager
description:
Основные задачи:

  • Research Design & Proposal Development:
    • Drafts a concept for analysis designs/project reports;
  • Project Execution:
    • Work with a team to design studies, edit research tools, and plan analysis and reporting;
    • Handles day-to-day issues of the project;
    • Alignment and collaboration with internal groups;
    • Responsible for project controlling of respective projects;
    • Supports in refining report structure;
    • Oversee the data collection processes;
    • Quality checks of data.

  • Analysis & Reporting:
    • Creates presentation charts;
    • Supports in creating impactful reports with detailed and meaningful insights;
    • Translates client briefings into analysis design/data cuts;
    • Proactive maintain knowledge about Consumer Panel products and FMCG markets. Proactive apply efficiency improvements own and team projects;
    • Analyzes data and use a variety of tools to analyze data for meaningful results.

Requirements:

  • Experience as an analyst ( at FMCG,Media-research, Consulting, Traditional research companies) - 1-3 years;
  • Excel, PowerPoint - Advanced; R, SPSS, VBA - advantage;
  • Has a broad understanding of statistical methods of analyzing data;
  • Advanced analytical skills;
  • Learns quickly;
  • Drives for high quality results;
  • Works out processes to get things done.

Условия:

  • huge amount of projects;
  • career and professional growth;
  • competitive salary;
  • full-time position;
  • location: Belarusskaya/Novoslobodskaya. Mixed working format.
